analysis.description:
CryptoBall645.withdrawMyBalance (/unique_chucks/22/0x37a4de24afcdbdf1f1fcd547fe184d2080c4e04e.sol#1326-1337) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_userBalance) (/unique_chucks/22/0x37a4de24afcdbdf1f1fcd547fe184d2080c4e04e.sol#1333)

CryptoBall645.withdrawBalanceAmount (/unique_chucks/22/0x37a4de24afcdbdf1f1fcd547fe184d2080c4e04e.sol#1337-1344) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_amount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x37a4de24afcdbdf1f1fcd547fe184d2080c4e04e.sol)
Address.isContract (/unique_chucks/22/0x37a4de24afcdbdf1f1fcd547fe184d2080c4e04e.sol#263-284) is declared view but contains assembly code
